name: The Adventure of a Small Boat
name_original: The Adventure of a Small Boat
description:
How to play:

-Move Left: A

-Move Right : D

That's it! Just get the highest score possible!

I managed to get a lot of experience for this Weekly Game Jam! I couldn't finish the previous one at all and had a hard time finishing its mechanics. So, I decided to change the engine and give Godot a try! There were some things that I had a hard time with but I prevailed!

It is unfortunate that I couldn't make some music and sound effects since  I have experience in music and sound design. There are things that need to get fixed though which are:

- Fix UI

- Make the gameplay better

- Fix particles

-Add a water trail on the boat

-Sound Effects

-Music

I tried to upload an HTML file but I couldn't make it work. I might be able to upload one at a later date.
